thread.title: 10 best Nirvana songs - but do you know the opening lines?
thread.title_full: 10 best Nirvana songs - but do you know the opening lines?

author: Adam Boult
title: 10 best Nirvana songs - but do you know the opening lines?
text:
10 best Nirvana songs - but do you know the opening lines? Nirvana's Kurt Cobain, Krist Novoselic and Dave Grohl Credit: Rex Adam Boult 5 April 2016 • 2:28pm 
K urt Cobain was trending on Twitter on Tuesday this week, as fans around the world marked the 22nd anniversary of his death. 
Expect to hear a lot more Nirvana-related reminiscing in the coming months, with this September marking the 25th anniversary of the release of Nevermind, the band's massively successful breakthrough album. 
Ahead of that milestone, the latest issue of Rolling Stone carries an interview with bassist Krist Noveoselic , who reflects on the album's enduring appeal: 
"In 1991, there was no Number One rock record the whole year before Nevermind . It's, like, was rock dead? But rock wasn't dead. It just got reinvented into grunge or alternative, heavy metal, hard rock and punk, art rock – this mishmash of influences. It all came together to make a lot of different music. But the thing is there was a different sensibility, or a realignment. Maybe we're due for that again." Read more 
Just for the fun of it, we put together this entirely subjective list of the 10 best Nirvana songs - then tried to recall their opening lines. 
How many of them do you remember? 
Your target: Between zero and four out of 10 right is below par. Between five and seven is a thoroughly respectable score. Eight and higher puts you in the higher echelons of quiz mastery. 
Share your result on Facebook and let the world know how you got on.
